name: infogra.me
tag_list: infographic, information-graphics, data-visualization, visual-communication, content-marketing, information-design
overview:
infogra.me is the first Infographics & Visual Communication online platform that connects Designers, Marketing Professionals and Journalists worldwide.

Born in October 2011, infogra.me is the leading Infographic Design platform in Japan, and specializes in Visual Content Marketing services.

We work with top Brands on Visual Communication projects that include Infographics, Infographic Press Releases, Visual Reports, and the production of Engaging Visual Contents.

Clients and partners include leading global companies such as Microsoft Japan, Wacom, Sony Life Insurance and Proto Corporation.

We work with creators, creative agencies and PR companies across the world, and combine production services with Digital PR and Social Media Action.
